title: 820-00850 5V, 0.03A, clean
message:
No visible damage, clean board. All cd3215's measure the same, no cycling on any of them. 

All 4 LDO voltages present for all, except BMC.

title: 820-00850 5V, 0.03A, clean
message:
As always for T2 machines; start with DFU mode.
If not recognized, then check if all AWAKE and SLPS2R voltages are present.

title: 820-00850 5V, 0.03A, clean
message:
No DFU / not recognised.

pp1v2_awake 0v
pp1v8_awake = 0.13v
pp3v3_awake = 0.003v

pp0v8_SLPS2R = 0v
pp1v1_SLPS2R = 0v
pp1v8_SLPS2R = 0v
soc_red_SLPS2R = 0v

title: 820-00850 5V, 0.03A, clean
message:
Do you get PPBUS_G3H and 3V3_G3H_RTC?
If not, check for short to ground...

title: 820-00850 5V, 0.03A, clean
message: Spot on, short on PPBUS_G3H. Thought I'd checked that earlier, apparently not. Laptop is fixed now. Thanks!
